HOME.DESCRIPTION: I'm a Full-Stack developer passionate about creating solutions that not only meet functional requirements but also deliver exceptional performance and build user trust through stable and secure experiences.

ABOUT.TITLE: About
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Full-Stack Developer
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_1: At the age of 20, I'm a full-stack developer with a passion for creating robust and scalable solutions. With experience in Node.js, Spring Boot and TypeScript, I develop APIs and systems that prioritize performance and security, applying Domain-Driven Design (DDD) concepts to create well-structured architectures aligned with business needs.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_2: I also have knowledge of Angular and React, which allows me to have a complete view of full-stack development and collaborate effectively with front-end teams. I'm looking for opportunities that allow me to apply my technical knowledge while continuing to evolve as a developer, contributing to innovative and impactful projects.

EDUCATION.TITLE: Education
EDUCATION.DESCRIPTION_1: Technology degree course focused on software development, programming, databases, software engineering and project management.
EDUCATION.DESCRIPTION_2: Technical training in programming, web development, databases and computer networks.
EDUCATION.DESCRIPTION_3: I studied English for 3 years of my life, reaching an Intermediate level of English and being able to communicate.

PROJECTS.TITLE: Projects
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION_1: Robust API developed with Node.js and TypeScript, implementing Domain-Driven Design (DDD) for project management. It uses PostgreSQL as its database and offers JWT authentication for security.
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION_2: REST API being developed for e-commerce in Spring Boot with Java. It implements product catalog, shopping cart, user management and order processing functionalities.
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION_3: Personal portfolio developed with Angular and TypeScript, presenting projects, skills and professional experience. Modern, responsive interface with smooth animations and glassmorphism design.
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION_4: First project with Spring Boot implementing complete CRUD operations. Containerized with Docker to facilitate deployment and development. Demonstrates knowledge of microservices architecture.

CONTACTS.TITLE: Contacts
CONTACTS.DESCRIPTION_1: Contact us by email to discuss projects, professional opportunities or collaborations.
CONTACTS.DESCRIPTION_2: I'm available for quick conversations and to discuss projects. Please contact me via WhatsApp.
CONTACTS.DESCRIPTION_3: Connect with me on LinkedIn to follow my professional career and exchange experiences.
CONTACTS.DESCRIPTION_4: Explore my repositories and open source projects. Contributions and collaborations are always welcome!
